新研究表明，您的乳制品选择如何影响您的2型糖尿病风险一项对瑞典成年人的研究发现，对非发酵牛奶和奶酪的高摄入量增加了2型糖尿病的风险，而发酵牛奶，奶油和黄油则提供了保护效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/how-your-dairy-choices-could-could-impact-your--------------------------------糖尿病 - 糖尿病 - 纽约 - 纽约 - 纽约 - shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/how-your-dairy-choices-could-could-impact-your-------------------------------糖尿病 - 糖尿病 - 糖尿病 - 纽约 - 纽约 - 纽约 - saspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B4A395FE-57A4-468A-BD20-51D4253A08B3 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 00:13:00 -0400 How your dairy choices could impact your risk of type 2 diabetes, new study shows
医用大麻可能有助于减少渴望并改善恢复结果UBC Okanagan和Thompson Rivers University的一项新试点研究研究了医学监督的大麻在住宅恢复之家中的使用方式可能会支持人们接受药物使用挑战的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/medical-cannabis-may-help-reduce-cravings-cravings-and-improve-recovery-uncovery-ustcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/medical-cannabis-may-help-reduce-cravings-cravings-and-cravings-and-improve-recovery-uncovery-ustcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b57d485b-8e48-4971-8b17-636ee3f9f9f85a Fri, 04 Apr 2025 23:52:15 -0400 Medical cannabis may help reduce cravings and improve recovery outcomes
研究：农村癌症患者越过专门护理的州线在一项由联邦资助的研究中，犹他大学亨斯曼癌症研究所的研究人员（U）发现，有7％的Medicare患者越过癌症护理的国家边界，而住在农村地区的患者的比率几乎是两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/study-rural-cancer-patients-patients-cross-state-lines-for-for-pecialized-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/study-rural-cancer-patients-patients-cross-state-lines-for-for-pecialized-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=762171da-eca0-430d-96b8-935a673c4e31 Fri, 04 Apr 2025 23:12:30 -0400 Study: Rural cancer patients cross state lines for specialized care
用基于豆类的口香糖来打击流感和疱疹的新方法在当今的相互联系的世界中，传染病构成了不断升级的威胁，如冠状病毒大流行和H1N1，SARS，SARS，Ebola，ebola，Zika和H5N1（鸟流感）病毒的爆发所证明的那样，所有这些病毒都具有重大的全球健康和经济影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/new-apphach-to-combat-combat-influenza-and-herpes-with----------------------------------------------------------- gum.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/new-apphach-combact-combat-combat-influenza-and-herpes-with------------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08AD303C-E334-407B-A14E-CF8310DCDEE0 Fri, 04 Apr 2025 23:07:36 -0400 New approach to combat influenza and herpes with bean-based gum
研究揭示了黑人服务医院的护理差距一项刚刚在护理研究中发表的新研究发现了有关患者结局的差异，特别是与护理护理有关的差异，主要是为黑人社区服务的医院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/study-reveals-nursing-care-gaps-gaps-inblack-inblack-serving-serving-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/study-reveals-nursing-care-gaps-gaps-nursing-gaps-in-black-serving-serving-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f72d846f-9c3b-49f5-b3EA-1850429fb325 Fri, 04 Apr 2025 23:02:05 -0400 Study reveals nursing care gaps in Black-serving hospitals
冷冻EM揭示了人类染色质重塑剂的精细结构细节染色质重塑在基因调节中起着至关重要的作用，影响了DNA的访问方式。此过程中的破坏也可能导致癌症和其他疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/cryo-em-reveals-fine-structural-structural-details-of-human-chromatin-remodeler-remodeler-in-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/cryo-em-em-reveals-fine-structural-structural-details-of-human-chromatin-cromatin-remodeler-in-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7826a9d0-40fd-4bf1-b9e7-575ec6a3333c1c Fri, 04 Apr 2025 22:56:20 -0400 Cryo-EM reveals fine structural details of human chromatin remodeler in action
研究：对私人医生的信任按政治分歧俄勒冈大学的新研究发现，民主党人比共和党人更有可能信任他们的私人医生并遵循医生的建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/study-trust-in-personal-doctors-divided-along-political-lination-lines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/study-trust-in-personal-doctors-divided-along-politication-political-line.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af929cc2-8ef6-4442-a02f-3b5d6e57d96d Fri, 04 Apr 2025 16:21:00 -0400 Study: Trust in personal doctors divided along political lines
科学家发现保护和修复线粒体的细胞机制线粒体的遗传物质的损害 - 简短的线粒体DNA或mtDNA可能会导致疾病，例如帕金森氏症，阿尔茨海默氏症，肌萎缩性外侧硬化症（ALS），心血管疾病，心血管疾病和2型糖尿病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/scientists-discover-cellular-cellular-mechanism-to-protect-and-repair-mitochondria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/scientists-discover-cellular-cellular-mechanism-to-protect-and-repair-mitochondria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0758082c-a629-4b9b-9d29-d29-29-29-2f184ccd7fa8 Fri, 04 Apr 2025 16:14:00 -0400 Scientists discover cellular mechanism to protect and repair mitochondria
化学测试导致抗铂抗卵巢癌的更好结果NPJ Precision肿瘤学杂志上发表的新的3期试验的结果发现，癌症干细胞测试可以准确选择更有效的治疗方法，并为抗铂抗性卵巢癌患者的预后改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/chemoid-test-leads-to-better-comes-in-platinum-comesistant-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/chemoid-test-leads-to-better-comes-in-platinum-comesistant-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B08E355D-5E74-4D0D0D-BCF7-501765A30BB6 Fri, 04 Apr 2025 16:06:00 -0400 ChemoID test leads to better outcomes in platinum-resistant ovarian cancer
enfortumab vedotin和pembrolizumab对尿路上皮癌患者的主要好处尿铺上皮是尿路线条的粘膜术语。其中包括肾脏骨盆，输尿管，膀胱和尿道上部。在绝大多数情况下，尿路癌在膀胱中生长（膀胱癌）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/enfortumab-vedotin-and-pembrolizumab-show-major-benefits-for-urlothelial-carcinamoma-carcinamoma-carcinamoma-carcinamoma-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250404/enfortumab-vedotin-and-pembrolizumab-show-major-benefits-for-urothelial-rothelial-carcinoma carcinomamoma-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1C3C75AC-4C2B-4BB4-8359-B3709299A5EF Fri, 04 Apr 2025 15:56:00 -0400 Enfortumab vedotin and pembrolizumab show major benefits for urothelial carcinoma patients
